channel.title: How to create donator page:S
channel.description:
erm..i would like to know how to create a page for people to donate on..like a page where people would pay with paypal and the $ wil be sent to my paypal , so how do i do that:) plzhelp!
oh and how do i make an object donator only :S

item.title: How to create donator page:S
item.dc:creator: @coole210 coole210
item.description:
@coole210 wrote:

You can make a shop in a secret place like mod & admin zone owner zone DONATOR zone e.t.c…

People pay… They get to go into those areas and pick out what they want… Ez
